body_html:
Hi, @byronyi

Sorry for late reply. I tried to replace the original code with the modified code in gdr_memory_manager.cc, based on tf r 1.10.1. But it failed. Then I downloaded the master source code and tried to install it, but it failed again with the following error messages:

ERROR: /home/shuai/tensorflow-master/tensorflow/contrib/gdr/BUILD:61:1: C++ compilati
tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.cc: In constructor 'tensorflow::GdrWorker::GdrWorke
tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.cc:46:45: error: no matching function for call to '
       recv_tensor_recent_request_ids_(100000) {}
                                             ^
In file included from ./tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.h:22:0,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.cc:16:
./tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_worker_service.h:36:3: note: candidate
   GrpcWorker(WorkerEnv* env, const ConfigProto& config);
   ^
./tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_worker_service.h:36:3: note:   candida
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build

body:
Hi, @byronyi 

Sorry for late reply. I tried to replace the original code with the modified code in gdr_memory_manager.cc, based on tf r 1.10.1. But it failed. Then I downloaded the master source code and tried to install it, but it failed again with the following error messages:
```
ERROR: /home/shuai/tensorflow-master/tensorflow/contrib/gdr/BUILD:61:1: C++ compilati
tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.cc: In constructor 'tensorflow::GdrWorker::GdrWorke
tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.cc:46:45: error: no matching function for call to '
       recv_tensor_recent_request_ids_(100000) {}
                                             ^
In file included from ./tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.h:22:0,
                 from tensorflow/contrib/gdr/gdr_worker.cc:16:
./tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_worker_service.h:36:3: note: candidate
   GrpcWorker(WorkerEnv* env, const ConfigProto& config);
   ^
./tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_worker_service.h:36:3: note:   candida
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
```
